name: Nidalee
title: the Bestial Huntress
r_dispalyname: Aspect of the Cougar / Aspect of the Cougar 2

i1.blurb: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.
description: {{sbc|Innate - Hunt:}} Hitting [[monster]]s or enemy champions with ''{{ai|Javelin Toss}}'' or ''{{ai|Bushwhack}}'' grants '''Prowl''' for 4 seconds and marks the target as '''Hunted''' for the same duration, granting {{tip|true sight|True Sight}} of them. Additionally, '''Nidalee's''' first use of ''{{ai|Takedown}}'' and ''{{ai|Pounce}}'' against '''Hunted''' targets are empowered. '''Prowl''' is also gained for 2 seconds while inside a {{tip|brush}}.
{{sbc|Prowl:}} Grants '''Nidalee''' {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, increased to {{as|30%|ms}} when facing a {{tt|nearby|1400 range}} [[Sight|visible]] enemy {{tip|champion}}.
i1.name: Prowl
notes: * Marked units outside ''Hunt's'' range will not be revealed.

q1.blurb: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' hurls a javelin forward in a line, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to the first enemy it hits, which is increased by {{pp|9|key=%|type=distance traveled|0|25|50|75|100|125|150|175|200|525|621.875|718.75|815.625|912.5|1009.375|1106.25|1203.125|1300|formula=0%{{plus}}(25% per 96.875 units traveled). ''This is capped at 200%. Damage ramps from 525 to 1300 units''}}.
q1.name: Javelin Toss

q2.blurb: As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee's''' next [[basic attack]] gains {{sti|range|75 '''bonus''' range}} and is modified to deal {{as|magic damage}}, increased by an amount for every {{as|1% of target's '''missing''' health}}.
{{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' Bonus:}} ''Takedown'' deals 40% increased damage to ''Hunted'' targets.
''Takedown'' resets '''Nidalee's''' autoattack timer. Other damage converted to magic damage by ''Takedown'' are not increased by ''Takedown's'' respective effects.
q2.name: Takedown
notes: * ''Takedown'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nidalee's'' previous orders.

* The attack enhanced by ''Takedown'' will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal (damage not increased by ''Takedown'') (magic damage to ''{{ai|Prowl||Hunted}}'' targets is displayed as such only for clarity reasons) as well as affect structures (will not deal bonus damage based on their '''missing''' health).

* Basic attacks enhanced by ''Takedown'' convert {{nie|Spellblade}} damage from {{ii|Sheen}}, {{ii|Iceborn Gauntlet}}, and/or {{ii|Trinity Force}} from physical to magic. Their damage is however not increased by ''Takedown''.

* ''Takedown's'' enhanced attack cannot be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} but can be {{ai|Riposte|Fiora|parried}}, {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}, and/or miss if ''Nidalee'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}}.

w1.blurb: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' lays a trap at the target location, which {{tip|Stealthed Trap|stealths}} and arms after a brief delay and lasts for up to 2 minutes. The next enemy who springs the trap takes {{as|magic damage}} over 4 seconds, granting {{tip|true sight|True Sight}} for the duration.

Traps have {{as|{{sti|health|6 '''maximum''' health}}}} and can only be damaged by champion basic attacks (2 damage from {{tip|ranged}} and 3 from {{tip|melee}}). Up to a maximum of {{pp|4|4 to 10|1 to 16}} traps may be active at once.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|10 to 50}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|10*4 to 50*4}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}
w1.name: Bushwhack

w2.blurb: As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} a fixed distance in the direction of the cursor, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies around her landing point.
{{sbc|''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' Bonus:}} '''Nidalee''' can cursor-over ''Hunted'' enemies to ''Pounce'' on them from increased range.

[[Kill]]ing a unit while in ''Cougar Form'' or using ''Pounce's'' ''Hunt'' bonus reduces ''Pounce's'' remaining {{sti|cooldown}} to a value. This has no effect if the remaining cooldown is already lower than that value.
leveling: {{sbc|''{{ai|Pounce}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' rank}}
w2.name: Pounce
notes: * '''Pounce''' goes on cooldown on cast, and will not receive the reduced cooldown if the target becomes ''Hunted'' mid-air.
* {{Pending for test}} {{ci|Akali}} can still be affected by an enhanced ''{{ai|Pounce}}'' during her {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali}}.

e1.blurb: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' evokes the spirit of the cougar, {{tip|healing}} the target allied champion or herself, increased by {{as|{{pp|11|label1=target's '''missing''' health|label2=Heal increase|key=%|0 to 100|key1=%|0 to 100|displayformula=1% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health}}|health}}, and granting them {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 7 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Minimum Heal|{{ap|35 to 115}} {{as|(+ {{fd|32.5}}% AP)}}|Maximum Heal|{{ap|35*2 to 115*2}} {{as|(+ 65% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 60}}%}}
e1.name: Primal Surge
notes: * The bonus attack speed will persist through ''{{ai|Aspect of the Cougar 2||Cougar Form}}'' if '''Nidalee''' uses ''{{ai|Primal Surge}}'' on herself.

e2.blurb: As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' claws at enemies in an arc in the direction of the cursor, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies hit.
leveling:
{{sbc|''{{ai|Swipe}}'' scales with ''{{ais|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' rank}}
{{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|70 to 250 4}} {{as|(+ 45% AP)}}}}
e2.name: Swipe

r1.blurb: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms herself into a cougar, gaining {{tip|melee}} attacks with {{sti|range|125 range}} as well as new [[Champion ability|abilities]].
Triggering ''{{ai|Prowl||Hunt}}'' resets ''Aspect of the Cougar's'' {{sti|cooldown}} if '''Nidalee''' is in human form.
'''Nidalee''' begins with one rank in ''Aspect of the Cougar'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
leveling: {{sbc|Cougar form's abilities rank up when ''{{ai|Aspect of the Cougar}}'' does}}
r1.name: Aspect of the Cougar

r2.blurb: Nidalee reverts to human form, gaining her basic abilities.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nidalee''' transforms herself into a human, gaining {{tip|ranged}} attacks with 525 {{sti|range}} as well as new [[Champion ability|abilities]].
'''Nidalee''' begins with one rank in ''Aspect of the Cougar'' and can increase it at levels 6, 11, and 16.
leveling: {{sbc|Cougar form's abilities rank up when ''{{ai|Aspect of the Cougar 2||Aspect of the Cougar}}'' does}}
r2.name: Aspect of the Cougar
